entities.name: room 425
entities.description: The room where the conversation is taking place. It is described as 'the unknowable room' and has a ceiling that Kreacher can hear.

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: A house-elf who is pretending not to hear Harry's conversation with Dobby. He makes a deep bow and Disapparates when told to leave.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: A house-elf who is being spoken to by Harry. He thanks Harry and then vanishes.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is speaking to Kreacher and Dobby. He tells them to leave and then turns to Ron and Hermione to discuss their plan.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, who is attempting to mop up a mess of ink on the floor. He is described as 'glum' when discussing their plan.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, who helps Ron with the ink and then discusses the plan with Harry.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: A character who is going up to a location with 'a variety of students'. Hermione is concerned about how many people are in on his plan.

relationships.description: Harry tells Kreacher to pretend he cannot hear.
Harry speaks to Dobby and tells him to leave.
Kreacher listens to Harry's conversation with Dobby.
Dobby thanks Harry for telling him to leave.
Ron is helped by Hermione when she pulls the sodden essay towards her and begins siphoning off the ink with her wand.
Harry discusses his plan with Ron and Hermione.
Hermione is concerned about Malfoy's plan to go up to a location with 'a variety of students'.
